text: “Lero mwaloledwa zonse zabwino ndi chakudya cha omwe adapatsidwa buku nchololedwa kwa inu, ndiponso chakudya chanu nchololedwa kwa iwo, ndipo (mukuloledwa kuwakwatira) akazi abwino a mwa okhulupirira ndi akazi abwino a mwa omwe adapatsidwa ma buku kale, ngati mwawapatsa chiwongo chawo m’njira yomanga nawo ukwati, osati mochita nao chiwerewere, osatinso mochita nao zibwenzi. Ndipo amene akane kukhulupirira, ndiye kuti yaonongeka ntchito yake; ndipo iye tsiku lachimaliziro adzakhala mwa oluza (otaiyika)
